name: cascade-enterprise-ram
description: 6-layer memory architecture with RAM disk acceleration - sub-millisecond reads via dual-write pattern
long_description:
# CASCADE Enterprise with RAM Disk

A complete 6-layer memory architecture with RAM disk acceleration for sub-millisecond performance:

- **Episodic Memory**: Sessions, conversations, temporal experiences
- **Semantic Memory**: Knowledge, concepts, definitions
- **Procedural Memory**: Skills, processes, how-to guides
- **Meta Memory**: Self-awareness, insights, reflections
- **Identity Memory**: Core values, preferences, defining characteristics
- **Working Memory**: Active context, current task data

## Performance

| Mode | Read Latency |
|------|--------------|
| Disk Only | 2-5ms |
| RAM + Disk (dual-write) | <1ms |

Dual-write architecture: writes go to both RAM and disk simultaneously. Reads come from RAM. If RAM fails, automatic fallback to disk. Zero data loss guarantee.
